election_record.label: New York 1802 State Senate, Western District

overview.note: The New-York Evening Post (New York, NY), June 11, 1802, lists 7268 votes for Mathhias B. Tallmadge, 7067 votes for Asa Danforth, 7041 votes for Joseph Annin, 6363 votes for David Ostrom, 6322 votes for John Meyer, 6104 votes for Frederick Gettman, 6165 votes for William Beekman, 6522 votes for Walter Wood, and 685 votes for Adam B. Vrooman in the Western District.

sub_unit.name: Cayuga
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 218 votes for William Beekman in Cayuga county.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 25, 1802, and the Centinel, May 25, 1802, list 769 votes for Asa Danforth and 724 vote for George Tiffany in Cayuga county.
The Centinel, May 25, 1802, lists 724 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge in Cayuga county.

sub_unit.name: Aurelius
sub_unit.note: Some sources spell Aurelius as "Aureluis."
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 25, 1802, lists 45 votes for William Beekman and 259 votes for George Tiffany in Aurelius.

sub_unit.name: Ovid
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 25, 1802, lists 117 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge in Ovid.

sub_unit.name: Scipio
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 25, 1802, lists 72 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge in Scipio.

sub_unit.name: Washington
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 25, 1802, lists 76 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge in Washington.

sub_unit.name: Chenango
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 787 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge in Chenango county.
The Centinel, May 18, 1802, lists 755 votes for George Tiffany in Chenango county.
Amasa Mossy received 1 vote as Amos Muzzy.

sub_unit.name: Herkimer
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 722 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge and 365 votes for Walter Wood in Herkimer county.

sub_unit.name: Montgomery
sub_unit.note: The Centinel, May 14, 1802, lists 1396 votes for George Tiffany in Montgomery county.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 1456 votes for Asa Danforth, 1448 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge, and 62 votes for Adam B. Vrooman in Montgomery county.

sub_unit.name: Oneida
sub_unit.note: The Centinel, May 14, 1802, lists 774 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge, 667 votes for Asa Danforth, 854 votes for Joseph Annin, 1504 votes for David Ostram, 1423 voes for Wiliam Beekman, and 1406 votes for Frederick Gettman.

The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 835 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge, 660 votes for Asa Danforth, 849 votes for Joseph Annin, 1503 votes for David Ostram, 1415 votes for William Beekman, and 1424 votes for Frederick Gettman.

sub_unit.name: Onondaga
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 275 votes for Frederick Gettman in Onondaga county.

sub_unit.name: Easton
sub_unit.note: Matthias B. Tallmadge received 5 votes as Matthias Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Jerusalem
sub_unit.note: Matthias B. Tallmadge received 1 vote as Matthew B. Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Sparta
sub_unit.note: Matthias B. Tallmadge received 30 votes as Matthias Tallmadge.

sub_unit.name: Otsego
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 966 votes for Asa Danforth, 751 votes for Frederick Gettman, and 101 votes for Adam B. Vrooman in Otsego county.

sub_unit.name: Middlefield
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 11, 1802, lists 1 vote for Adam B. Vrooman in Middlefield.

sub_unit.name: Richfield
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 11, 1802, lists no votes for Adam B. Vrooman in Richfield.

sub_unit.name: Schoharie
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY), May 7, 1802, lists 285 votes for John Meyer and 346 votes for William Beekman.
The Albany Register (Albany, NY), June 8, 1802, lists 536 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge, 515 votes for Joseph Annin, 229 votes for Frederick Gettman, and 247 votes for Adam B. Vrooman.

sub_unit.name: Tioga
sub_unit.note: The Albany Register (Albany, NY) lists 298 votes for Matthias B. Tallmadge, 304 votes for Asa Danforth, 200 votes for David Ostrom, and 200 votes for John Meyer.

election_record.reference: Original Election Books. Steuben County Court House, Bath.
New-York Evening Post (New York, NY). June 11, 1802.
